description: Insights are currently generated client-side. This structure shows what backend should generate from event data.

sampleInsights.title: Sleep & Mood Link
sampleInsights.aiConclusion: We noticed Aria's evening mood is closely connected to daytime rest. On days with 45+ minute naps, evenings are smoother.
sampleInsights.actionTip: On shorter nap days, try starting the bedtime routine 15 minutes earlier to prevent overtiredness.

sampleInsights.title: Nutrition Opportunities
sampleInsights.aiConclusion: Aria had a carb-focused week with pasta appearing 5 times. Only 1 green veggie attempt. There's room to add more variety.
sampleInsights.actionTip: Try hiding veggies in smoothies or mixing peas into mac & cheese this weekend.

sampleInsights.title: Friendship Patterns
sampleInsights.aiConclusion: Emma remains Aria's favorite playmate. This week we noticed Noah appearing more often â€“ a new friendship is forming!
sampleInsights.actionTip: At pickup, ask: 'What did you and Noah play today?' to encourage this budding friendship.
